Articles.Author: PTI
Articles.Title: 19 years after theatrical release, Sanjay Leela Bhansali's 'Black' gets OTT release
Articles.Description: ​For his role in 'Black', Bachchan went on to receive his second National Film Award for best actor. The movie won two more National Awards in best feature film in Hindi category and costume design for Sabyasachi Mukherjee.
Articles.Content: New Delhi: Megastar Amitabh Bachchan on Sunday said that his 2005 film 'Black' has started streaming on Netflix and he hopes the critically-acclaimed drama gives strength and compassion to the viewer… [+1443 chars]
